Sec. 33-284.13. Uses permitted.
Uses permitted under planned development shall be residential dwelling units and hotel and motel rooms as provided in with accompanying convenience retail facilities hereinafter provided. A combination of commercial and residential development may also be permitted if in accordance with the requirements contained herein. Development need not reflect the particular dwelling type, setbacks, floor area ratios or other criteria inherent in the individual zoning districts within the planned development site unless planning studies or previously approved site plans specify certain criteria that shall be adhered to.
Permitted commercial uses shall be those permitted under the most liberal commercial zoning existing on the site.
